question:
Write a letter to the hotel manager to make arrangement for hosting a party for one of your friend's. In your letter 

tell the manager about the reason for the party
Explain what requirements you have
As about the availability of facilities and the menu
text: I am writing this letter to inform you of arrangements for the party which my friend is throwing on son,s 5th birthday on 11th March. To be more precise , I request you to all  the arrangements perfectly done likewise all the games for kids and food as well. Furthermore, I have fixed  the menu yesterday and sent it to you already via email about all the dietary requirements accordingly the preferences of children.

Moreover, we have planned a few games for children so please make sure there should be enough and a safe place for adolescents  to play all the games. Additionally , there are a few gifts we have sent to your hotel already which we will distribute on that day as  returned gifts so make sure please keep them in  a  safe place.Similarly, as we know in your hotel, a variety of rides and swings for kids which undoubtedly kids will enjoy so please have assurity as it's all sanitised properly.
I hope everything will be enjoyable as the way we all have planned .
Do not hesitate to contact me if you require any further information.
